Package com.suganya.pages

Class AmazonCategoryPage

java.lang.Object
com.suganya.utils.PageActions
com.suganya.pages.AmazonCategoryPage
public class AmazonCategoryPage extends PageActions
Page Object Class for the actions performed on Category Page in Amazon page
Author:
Suganya Jothiramalingam

  • Field Details

    • filterXpath

      private String filterXpath
      String variable to store the Xpath of filter element to be selected in Category page

      Contains 2 replaceable substrings which have to be replaced with the dynamic values passed from Test case - Filter section name & Filter value

    • sectionResults

      private org.openqa.selenium.By sectionResults
      By locator variable to store the element of Results section from Category page

    • linkSortIcon

      private org.openqa.selenium.By linkSortIcon
      By locator variable to store the link of sort dropdown icon

    • xpathSortType

      private String xpathSortType
      String variable to store the Xpath of the link of Sort type element in Category page

      Contains a replaceable substring which have to be replaced with the dynamic value of Sort type passed from Test case

    • xpathSortedBy

      private String xpathSortedBy
      String variable to store the Xpath of the link of Sorted type text field in Category page

      Contains a replaceable substring which have to be replaced with the dynamic value of Sort type passed from Test case

    • xpathSecondItem

      private org.openqa.selenium.By xpathSecondItem
      By locator variable to store the image link of second Item from sorted results in Category page

    • resultItem

      private org.openqa.selenium.By resultItem
      By locator variable to store the image link of product from the Product page opened in new tab

  • Constructor Details

    • AmazonCategoryPage

      public AmazonCategoryPage()

  • Method Details

    • filterCategoryResults

      public AmazonCategoryPage filterCategoryResults(String filterSection, String filterValue)
      Method to filter the Category page based on input parameters - Filter section name & filter value

      Also wait till the filtered results section gets loaded in the page

      Log the status Pass to Framework Logger after filtering the page along with screenshot

      Parameters:
      filterSection - Dynamic value of section name to be filtered which is passed as input from Test case
      filterValue - Dynamic value of filter text to be selected under the filter section which is passed as input from Test case
      Returns:
      Current instance of AmazonCategoryPage

    • sortResults

      public AmazonCategoryPage sortResults(String sortType)
      Method to sort the filtered results in Category page based on sort type

      Also wait till the sorting is applied in the results section

      Log the status Pass to Framework Logger after sorting the results along with screenshot

      Parameters:
      sortType - Dynamic value of sorting type to be applied on the results which is passed as input from Test case
      Returns:
      Current instance of AmazonCategoryPage

    • selectSecondItem

      public AmazonProductPage selectSecondItem()
      Method to click on second product from filtered results once the image of the product is visible

      Also, switch to the new tab opened to view the Product and wait till the product image is visible

      Log the status Pass to Framework Logger after clicking on the second product in results along with screenshot

      Returns:
      new instance of AmazonProductPage
